question: Which Institute launches online platform for food inspection, sampling?
option3: Indian Institute of Crop Processing Technology (IICPT)
option4: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI)
answer: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI)
explanation: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) launched 'FoSCoRIS', a nationwide online platform to bring in transparency in food safety inspection and sampling. The new system will bring together all key stakeholders food businesses, food safety officers (FSOs), designated officers, state food safety commissioners on a nation-wide IT platform and data related to inspection, sampling and test result data will be shared. It will help to verify compliance with food safety and hygiene standards by food businesses as per the government norms.
